entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
